response.job_title: Research and Intelligence analyst | MSc Sustainable Development Candidate - Sussex University | Chemical Engineer
response.summary:
Chemical Engineer and Sustainable Development Master candidate at the 
University of Sussex in Brighton (UK). With professional experience developing
environmental projects focused on driving social development and fostering 
innovation.
response.skills: Stata, MATLAB, R (Programming Language), English, Problem Solving, Leadership, Engineering, Chemical Engineering, Analytical Skills, Marketing

profile_positions.description:
Linked to the project: "Updating of
technologies and integration of ICTs to wastewater treatment systems for
the efficient reuse of water - design and implementation of prototypes of
ecological compact stations – ECOSTAR"

▪ In charge of the design, initial start-up and operation of compact wastewater treatment systems for
the efficient reuse of water.
profile_positions.title: Engineering Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Working for the Institute of Pacific Studies (IPS) at the National University of Colombia.
Assisting in developing environmental royalty projects: focused 
on establishing an ecosystem of innovation, research, and development in 
the Pacific region of Colombia. Doing the following:

▪ Provided support in planning and managing research projects, 
collaborating with universities, private firms, and the Colombian 
government.
▪ In charge of supporting the planning and management activities of the 
research project.
▪ Assisted in the design and operation of a pilot plant for the production 
of biogas from waste.
▪ Assisted in the development of academic reports and papers.
▪ Supported the development of workshops with communities and other
stakeholders.
profile_positions.title: Research assistant

education.degree_name: Master of Science - MS, Sustainable Development

company.name: CogX
company.description:
CogX’s mission is to provide the fastest way to learn from the experts that matter to you, so that we can work together and ensure we get the next 10 years right. 

We live in the exponential age with incredible transformational opportunities with many challenges along the way. Podcasts are an amazing way to stay up to date and learn, but currently discovery is terrible. It takes too long to browse and preview content, and there’s no community. 

In its beta release the CogX app provides a simple way to set your learning topics and then effortlessly browse snippets from a curated library of podcasts in a TikTok style hyper personalised feed. Set what you want to learn about with our simple onboarding or easy topic controls in your profile. Published by a curated list of the world’s best organisations and experts, you can save, share or recommend “snippets” from the content or dive deep into the full episode. Join the community by seeing and connecting with other users who are listening to matching content. There’s an exciting roadmap of features ahead which continue to leverage the latest in Machine Learning to continuously improve the experience for each type of user.

You can save, share or recommend snippets and follow your favourite experts, and of course deep dive into the full episode. While listening you can see who else is currently or has recently been listening to the same content and request a connection. There’s an exciting roadmap of features ahead which continue to leverage the latest in Machine Learning to continuously improve the experience for each type of user.

Co-founded by trailblazing serial tech entrepreneur Charlie Muirhead (Orchestream, Nexagent & Rightster); CogX aims to seek top talent from all industries and diverse backgrounds to join our team. People who succeed at CogX have something in common—they are tenacious, energetic and they strive to change the world and create positive impact.
